## oragano pesto -- 2017/05/31

5 cloves garlic
1tsp salt
1 cup lighlty packed oragano
1 cup olive oil 
1 cup raw hazelnuts
4cm^3 parmasean cheese

It was a little salty by itself, but that is probably good for cooking and preservation. 
I added it to pasta and it was decent. 7/10
